select t.id, t.title, t.area_code, t.play_time, r.title as areaTitle, t.create_time, t.update_time from poi_line t left join poi_area r on t.area_code = r.code where t.deleted = false
and t.area_code = #{param.areaCode}
and t.title like concat('%', #{param.queryName, typeHandler=com.eghm.handler.mysql.LikeTypeHandler}, '%')
order by id desc
